<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Jupyter">Jupyter<a class="anchor-link" href="#Jupyter"> </a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Cell">Cell<a class="anchor-link" href="#Cell"> </a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">

<pre><code>m : Switch to markdown
y : Switch to code
Ctrl + Shift + - :while editing a cell should split it at the cursor
D + D (press the key twice): delete current cell
z : Undo cell deletion</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Execute">Execute<a class="anchor-link" href="#Execute"> </a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">

<pre><code>Shift + Enter : execute and go to next cell
Ctrl + Enter  : execute and live in current cell</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Insert">Insert<a class="anchor-link" href="#Insert"> </a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">

<pre><code>a : To create cell above to current cell
b : To create cell bellow to current cell</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Cut-Copy-Paste">Cut Copy Paste<a class="anchor-link" href="#Cut-Copy-Paste"> </a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">

<pre><code>x : To cut the cell that can be pasted any where
c : To copy the cell that can be pasted any where
v : To paste the cell</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Markdown-in-jupyter">Markdown in jupyter<a class="anchor-link" href="#Markdown-in-jupyter"> </a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">

<pre><code>#, ## , ###, #### : headings
**string** : bold text
$ $ : math symbols
&gt; :indenting- : bullets
1 : numbered bullets</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Unix-commands">Unix commands<a class="anchor-link" href="#Unix-commands"> </a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">

<pre><code>!&lt;command&gt;</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
